snippet.title: EVE: Valkyrie - Warzone Launch Trailer | Cross-platform for PC and PS4
snippet.description:
EVE: Valkyrie – Warzone™ is a first-person spaceship shooter for PC, PlayStation®4 and virtual reality that puts you in the cockpit for fast, fun and intense multiplayer space combat. Controls are intuitive, and progression is deep. Buy now for PC and PS4: http://www.evevalkyrie.com/store

The first fully cross-platform, cross-reality videogame, EVE: Valkyrie - Warzone enables PC and PS4 gamers to fly and fight alongside each other, both in and out of VR, in fully balanced online space combat.
 
Hailed as the “killer app” for virtual reality, EVE: Valkyrie now brings the thrill and skill of competitive online space combat to everyone with the massive Warzone expansion. 
New ships, new modes, new maps, new reality. Welcome to the Warzone.

• Learn more: http://www.evevalkyrie.com/ 
• Follow: http://www.twitter.com/evevalkyrie 
• Like: http://www.facebook.com/evevalkyrie 

Music: “New Blood” (Dustin Burnett) by Zayde Wølf and "Next 2 Nothing" (Chris Lang, Eric Cunningham, Toshio Miyazaki)  
https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/new-blood/id1090769058?i=1090769059
